title: Seems that a lot of people don't know what "sweaty players" are
body:
They are players who are overachieving the game when they are already 15/1 and still do everything just to kill a support that's 0/18 with flash, etc. 

Their favorite anthem :
"_His palms are sweaty, mom's spagetti_" 


These people are dehydrated and need Gatorade or some sort to restore their body. They lost about 70% of water just thinking about how they are going to get an S+, lips are chap and balls are sticking to their thighs.
